title: Shein Review.
text: I love Shein. I always use it and it is cheap and affordable. But I do have on thing to complain about. They have a code that you can send to people to get free items. Like gift cards, clothing, and random things. I was doing it and i needed one more person to get it. I sent it to the person got back on the app i need 5 more people to do it. Now i am angry, and annoyed because i can‚Äôt find sheins email or anything. So i thought to leave this if you guys ever try to get the free stuff. Thank you, and Shein I wish you had better costumer service.

title: Cheep and good!

title: Doesn‚Äôt show the real price anymore & not enough plus size clothes
text:
I used to love SHEIN but they started showing an ‚Äúestimated price‚Äù instead of the actual cost of things and I absolutely hate this update! I used to enjoy getting my cart within a certain budget range and then applying the discount at the next step and it felt like I was saving money (girl math) but now I don‚Äôt get that and I have also seen a cart price go up when I remove something bc it‚Äôs adjusting the price of every item. Very annoying! 

Because of this I‚Äôve been struggling to order with them bc my brain just doesn‚Äôt like it anymore idk how else to explain 

 I also don‚Äôt like that a lot of the clothes are limited to a size large or xl if you‚Äôre lucky. As someone who recently entered the xl size range it‚Äôs really annoying having to search for entirely different clothes or look in a different section. I wish a lot of their popular clothes would also have plus sizes. Some of them do and you can click a button that says XL-3XL and it takes you to the plus size of that item but that option is very limited. 

Other than that, I‚Äôve been medium happy with my past purchases. Each item is very hit or miss, te quality and the sizing isn‚Äôt consistent.

title: I LOVE SHEIN!!
text:
As many people bash and say SHEIN is bad, it‚Äôs not all as bad as you think..Really CUTE clothes && GOOD prices..!! Ive been buying from SHEIN since March 2023, and I‚Äôve spent over $300 on them through out the year, I absolutely love the cute items and clothing they have for sale, and I love how you can get credit so easily! I really recommend SHEIN. 
I feel like they love me a lot too because they deliver my packages early! You don‚Äôt ever have to wonder oh this will take forever!! Nuh uh! SHEIN comes to you ASAP! might take a few days but it comes fast trust me. That‚Äôs why I love shein, they are fast & cheap. If you looking for cuteeee clothes but you on a budget!? Download shein!
